title: H.N Global Holdings Launches Global Expansion with Nature-Inspired Korean Beauty | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Promotional videos made in multiple languages are great help introducing products to overseas buyers.
Vita-Collagen Perfect Glow Cream of BEAUTY ABIDE , a premium skin care brand founded by Korean Beauty Brand Company H.N Global Holdings (Heena Seo, President), is standing out in the Global Market. This cream contains patented material for skin improvement, offers high quality at a reasonable price, and is gaining great popularity both at home and abroad.
In the past, Ms. Seo experienced skin damages to the point where she needed dermatological treatment after using cosmetics that were not suitable for her skin type for a long-term period, so that while thinking about a way to care for skin with regardless of skin type and less irritation, she planned to make the ‘Vita-Collagen Perfect Glow Cream’.
In the past, she experienced skin damages to the point where she needed dermatological treatment after using cosmetics that were not suitable for her skin type for a long-term period, so that while thinking about less irritating skin care method regardless of skin type, she planned to make the ‘Vita-Collagen Perfect Glow Cream’.
BEAUTY ABIDE pursues 'CLEAN BEAUTY' and develops products that minimize skin irritation by using nature-friendly ingredients. ‘Vita-Collagen Perfect Glow Cream’ is a functional cosmetic for whitening & wrinkle improvement that makes your skin bright and firm healthily, contains fast-absorbing low molecular collagens, 9Vitamin complex, 7Hyaluronics acids complex, and the patented substance for skin improving made by 'Technique of 7Days Maturing in Korea Traditional Earthenware & Ultra Sonic Extraction at low temperature'.
H.N Global Holdings opens up overseas markets based on its excellent products technology, they applied for ‘Content production support project for small business owners' which is operated by the ‘Ministry of SMEs and Startups’ and the 'Korea SMEs & Startups Distribution & Marketing Agency', and received a product promotional video, GIF file, and product image cuts in Chinese subtitles as a package.
They uploaded the promotional video of Vita-Collagen Perfect Glow Cream made in Chinese Language to TikTok, and it leads to connecting with Taiwanese and Chinese buyers who watched the video and succeeded in signing a contract. Utilizing the video in Chinese Language in Sanya Airport Duty Free-shop in Hainan China and Exhibitions in Guangzhou attracted the attention of buyers, it leads opening additional markets in Singapore and Hong Kong, and achieved success in global expansion.
President Seo said, “I had no idea that the supporting business I discovered by a chance would bring these good opportunities for company growth” and strongly recommended small and medium-sized businesses to participate in various support projects. She then expressed her ambition that “We will promote our 'Clean Beauty Philosophy' in more overseas markets and actively expand into the global market.
Meanwhile, applications for the ‘Content Production Supporting Business' for small and medium-sized businesses can be applied in the ‘Fanfandaero’ website operated by the Ministry of SMEs and Startups and the Korea SMEs & Startups Distribution & Marketing Agency in the first half of next year.
